description: Create an action item team member
permissions: Allowed for admins or users who are members of the responsible organization (or its broker) for the action item (delegated from ActionItemPolicy create?).
side_effects: Creates an action item team member; setting is_responsible_person to true will unset any existing responsible person for the same action item. Also triggers action item team member change notifications after commit.
validation_notes: --action-item and --user are required. user_id must be unique per action_item_id. user must have a membership related to the responsible organization unless the user is an admin. Only one responsible person can be true per action item; if set true, existing responsible person is cleared. action_item and user relationships are create-only.

flags.name: --is-responsible-person
flags.description: Whether the user is the responsible person
